original_text: Zechariah's child grew. God made him strong in his mind. He went into the wilderness and he lived there for many years. Later, God sent him to Israel's people, to teach them. 1: You can read what John taught the people in Luke 3. Zechariah's child grew. God made him strong in his mind. He went into the wilderness and he lived there for many years. Later, God sent him to Israel's people, to teach them. 1: You can read what John taught the people in Luke 3. Zechariah's child grew. God made him strong in his mind. He went into the wilderness and he lived there for many years. Later, God sent him to Israel's people, to teach them. 1: You can read what John taught the people in Luke 3. Zechariah's child grew. God made him strong in his mind. He went into the wilderness and he lived there for many years. Later, God sent him to Israel's people, to teach them.
korean_text: 아이가 자라며 심령이 강하여지며 이스라엘에게 나타나는 날까지 빈 들에 있으니라

sentences.original_text: Zechariah's child grew.
God made him strong in his mind.
He went into the wilderness
and he lived there for many years.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그곳에서 여러 해 동안 살았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Later, God sent him to Israel's people,
sentences.korean_translation: 후에, 하나님은 그를 이스라엘 백성에게 보내셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: to teach them.
1: You can read what John taught the people in Luke 3.
sentences.korean_translation: 1: 요한이 사람들을 가르친 내용은 누가복음 3장에서 읽을 수 있습니다.
